::Liono/Dark/Killfest::

A shot hits Liono in the shoulder as the Maximal takes out a plate 
and shoves it into the hole in his torso, mostly stopping the flow of 
Mechfluid. He looks up, boosting toward the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark Convoy slowly boosts up toward Motormaster, aiming his plasma 
rifle carefully at the bot's head. He slowly pulls the trigger.

"Argh!" He yells as a missile from Killfest smashes into his side, 
making the shot he had just fired miss Motormaster's head by a few 
feet. He spins around, firing at the approaching Killfest.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The blast slamming into Motormaster is to much for even his armored 
hide as
> he is flung back, his entire form smoking from the energy output. 
As he
> drifts back and tries to look up to see his target he has problems 
because
> of the smoke. "Ill get you for that" he screams, shooting randomly 
to hit a
> target.
